contents:
(sry 4 using trumpish)
There's a website called 羊城网 (gznf DOT net) , but it's Not Tremendous. They have the courage but they don't have hamberders and covfefe to host in non-China servers. We need a website that's beeter than LIHKG, HKGodlen, GZNF and many more. We will build a subsite here and let the Mandalorian speekers （捞语/官话使用者） pay for it!
